title: Mushroom and Barley Bake
ingredients: ['50g butter', '3 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '150g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '125ml dry sherry', '785ml chicken stock', '200g pearl barley', '2 teaspoons dried basil or to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
